tool_description: The Word Cloud Generator API, aptly titled "Word Cloud Generator" empowers you to effortlessly create captivating word clouds from text or URLs. With two user-friendly endpoints, one for text input and the other for URLs, you can generate visually stunning word clouds in a snap. Unleash your creativity and visualize textual data with ease using this cost-effective API.
name: Word Cloud Generator
title: Word Cloud Generator

api_list.name: Generate Word Cloud from Url
api_list.description: Generate Word Cloud from Url : It will generate a Word cloud based on the content of provided url.  Use /api/v1/url?url=<provide url>

api_list.name: Generate Word Cloud from Text
api_list.description: Endpoint to generate a Word cloud based on provided text. It could be single or multiline text. Use /api/v1/text?text=<provide your text here>

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog
